meanings.meaning: counter for guns, tools, leaves or cakes of something
sign of the snake or serpent
sign of the ox or cow
sign of the hare or rabbit
brilliant white luster of a gem
twelfth sign of the Chinese zodiac
counter for storeys of a building
counter for flat thin objects or sheets
counter for copies of a newspaper or magazine
counter for carriages (e.g., in a train)
counter for armor, suits, sets of furniture
counter for letters, notes, documents, etc.
counter for decades of ages, eras, etc.
